abstract: Unicef report finds water availability in Syria has been decreased by half since 2011, start of conflict; notes interruption of water supply is sometimes deliberate and used to achieve military or political superiority.
lead_paragraph: In a report about the scarcity of water in Syria, Unicef said it had recorded 18 deliberate cuts to the public water supply in Aleppo this year.

headline.main: Water Is Called Casualty of Syrian War
headline.print_headline: Water Is Called Casualty of War

snippet: In a report about the scarcity of water in Syria, Unicef said it had recorded 18 deliberate cuts to the public water supply in Aleppo this year.
